mock-user-123.title: Scheduled Maintenance on July 20th
mock-user-123.content: The platform will undergo scheduled maintenance on July 20th from 02:00 to 04:00 UTC. The AI Growth Engine may be temporarily unavailable during this period. Thank you for your understanding.

mock-user-123.title: Security Update: Withdrawal Addresses
mock-user-123.content: For your security, once a withdrawal address is saved, it cannot be changed directly. Please contact support if you need to update your address. This measure helps protect your assets from unauthorized access.
